task.title: Including Swift Mailer Required Files
task.shortdesc: Swift Mailer uses an auto-loader so the only file you need to include is the lib/swift_required.php file.

step.cmd: Put Swift Mailer somewhere accessible to your PHP scripts (this does not need to be in the web root).
Include, or require the lib/swift_required.php file.
Follow the remainder of the documentation for using the available components.

example.codeblock:
<?php

require_once '/path/to/swift-mailer/lib/swift_required.php';

/* rest of code goes here */
